snippet: Serie A surprise packages Sampdoria held their own in a 2-2 home draw with AC Milan on Saturday in a game which underlined both sides' promise but ultimately saw them drop important points....

headline.print_headline: Samp and Milan Make Case With Entertaining Draw
headline.main: Samp and Milan Make Case With Entertaining Draw

lead_paragraph: Serie A surprise packages Sampdoria held their own in a 2-2 home draw with AC Milan on Saturday in a game which underlined both sides' promise but ultimately saw them drop important points.
